title: 2 killed, 2 wounded in Riverside County shooting
content:
RIVERSIDE, Calif. (AP) — Riverside County homicide detectives are investigating the killings of two people and wounding of two others in semi-rural Mead Valley.
The Sheriff's Department says deputies responded at 12:17 a.m. Friday to a residence and found four adults who had been shot.
Two of the victims were dead at the scene and the others were taken to a hospital.
The victims' identities have been withheld pending notification of relatives.
Advertisement
Mead Valley is about 15 miles south of Riverside, between Lake Mathews and Lake Perris State Recreation Area.
